meanings.definition: Shrunken in advance of use or wear.
meanings.sent1: The preshrunken shirt was small even before I washed it.
meanings.sent2: I bought preshrunken jeans to avoid any unexpected size changes.
meanings.sent3: The preshrunken sweater was so tiny, it looked like it belonged to a doll!
meanings.sent4: Her preshrunken dress clung to her like a second skin.
meanings.sent5: The preshrunken fabric felt like it had already lived a whole life of shrinking.

meanings.definition: Having undergone a process to prevent further shrinking.
meanings.sent1: The preshrunken wool was safe from any more shrinking.
meanings.sent2: I prefer preshrunken towels as they stay fluffy after washing.
meanings.sent3: The preshrunken socks refused to shrink no matter how many times they were washed!
meanings.sent4: His preshrunken hat remained the perfect fit, no matter the weather.
meanings.sent5: The preshrunken fabric held onto its size like a stubborn child holding onto a toy.
